comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: The wind was angry yesterday, my Frenz, like an old man trying to send back soup at a deli. Once I hit Flagstaff Road, though, I was pretty well shielded from all but the occasional gust. So despite having to pick the gravel out of my teeth after riding up Baseline, it was a pretty decent ride.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: "Like an old man trying to send soup back at the deli?" NICE, Kev! My Poorman climb was like a Grendel-esque old blue-hair working the nickle slots at the Branding Iron Casino in Wendover NV.. Nasty. Unrelenting.
